Articles.Content: <figure class=""><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nj9okc5yHW1rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3D93aheD2qdfU" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/93aheD2qdfU?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" frameborder="0" height="281" width="500"></iframe></figure><p>Youtuber Brothgar takes an idea from an anime series and creates a rocket that looks a lot like a drill bit. It also reminds us a little of Leonardo da Vinci’s airscrew designs. Does it remind you of something?<br/></p>
